description:
Sumino Sayaka is http://anidb.net/ch89069 [Akuru]`s and http://anidb.net/ch89068 [Yoshiko]`s classmate who ends up becoming friends with the two. She too is level-headed and assumes the straight-man role, often moderating interactions between Yoshiko and others. She is also kind and worries about being boring, very sensitive, especially when others point out her small chest.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Sumino Sayaka
